member.name: P:ASC.Api.Impl.ApiContext.FilterToType
member.summary: Filters responce to specific type from request parameter "type"
member.remarks: The type name is retrieved from [DataContractAttribute] name

member.name: P:ASC.Api.Impl.ApiContext.SortBy
member.summary: Gets field to sort by from request parameter "sortBy"

member.name: P:ASC.Api.Impl.ApiContext.FilterBy
member.summary: Gets field to filter from request parameter "filterBy"

member.name: P:ASC.Api.Impl.ApiContext.FilterOp
member.summary: Gets filter operation from request parameter "filterOp" can be one of the following:"contains","equals","startsWith","present"

member.name: P:ASC.Api.Impl.ApiContext.FilterValue
member.summary: Gets value to filter from request parameter "filterValue"

member.name: P:ASC.Api.Impl.ApiContext.UpdatedSince
member.summary: Gets value to filter from request parameter "updatedSince"

member.name: M:ASC.Api.Impl.ApiContext.SetDataPaginated
member.summary: Set mark that data is already paginated and additional filtering is not needed
